answers.answer: Hi,you need to see a doctor for a checkup.  In particular you need to get your thyroid checked.S

Rapid weight gain doesn't fall into diabetes symptoms. Some diabetes symptoms include:* Frequent urination* Excessive thirst* Extreme hunger* Unusual weight loss* Increased fatigue* Irritability* Blurry visionSome possible other causes for rapid weight gain could be heart failure, liver disease or kidney disease, Cushing Syndrome, or polycystic ovary syndrome.Its time you see your doctor.

question: What are the symptoms of type 2 diabetes?  I barely eat and I am gaining weight stedily every day.  I even have a roll of fat that hangs below my bellybotton.  The little I do eat Is very healthy .Is this a symptom, rapid weight gain?
title: Rapid weight gain
